alternatives.tex-math: \documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage[substack]{amsmath} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage[mathscr]{eucal} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \DeclareFontFamily{T1}{linotext}{} \DeclareFontShape{T1}{linotext}{m}{n} {linotext }{} \DeclareSymbolFont{linotext}{T1}{linotext}{m}{n} \DeclareSymbolFontAlphabet{\mathLINOTEXT}{linotext} \begin{document} $$\eqalign{& {\rm{\% Wound \ contraction }} \cr & {\rm{ = }}{{{\rm{Wound \ area (day 0) - Wound \ area (day n) x 100}}} \over {{\rm{Wound \ area (day 0)}}}} \cr} $$ \end{document}
